= FAQ =

 Q:  The Autosearch Feature does not work for me! What can I do?<br>
 A:  It is also possible to set the IP manually:<br>
  {{{
  Open the file "valerie.properties" in your working direcotry and append
  MANUAL_SETTOPBOX=MANUFACTOR=My;MODEL=box;IPADDR=127.0.0.1;
  at the end. Where 127.0.0.1 should be the IP of your settop box.
  }}}
